OpenFile.Name: open file
OpenFile.Help: This command opens a new file

OpenNewTab.Name: open new tab
OpenNewTab.Help: This command opens a new tab

SearchTab.Name: search tab
SearchTab.Help: This command searches content in a tab

EditSearchTab.Name: edit search tab
EditSearchTab.Help: This command allows the user make a new search starting from the previous one

Find.Name: find
Find.Help: This command find the user-type string in the current tab. An empty input clears the search

FindNext.Name: find downward
FindNext.Help: This command find downwards a match of the user-type string in the current tab.

FindPrevious.Name: find upward
FindPrevious.Help: This command find upwards a match of the user-type string in the current tab.

MoveCursorRight.Name: move cursor right
MoveCursorRight.Help: This command moves the current tab to the one on the right

MoveCursorLeft.Name: move cursor left
MoveCursorLeft.Help: This command moves the current tab to the one on the left

ScrollDown.Name: scroll down
ScrollDown.Help: This command scrolls down the page

HistoryNext.Name: history next
HistoryNext.Help: This command loads the page to the next item in the history

HistoryPrevious.Name: history previous
HistoryPrevious.Help: This command loads the page to the previous item in the history
